product: Inito measures fertility hormones LH, E3G and PdG.
Inito provides quantitative hormone measurement instead of yes/no strips.
Testing works best when done daily at consistent time.
education: Ovulation usually occurs 24-36 hours after LH surge.
PdG confirms ovulation after it has occurred.
Pregnancy tests are most accurate 10-14 days after ovulation.
trust: Hormone tracking across cycles improves prediction accuracy.
Inito is designed for women trying to conceive who want deeper hormone insight.
Results should be interpreted along with cycle history.
app_usage: Users should log tests daily to see hormone trends.
The app predicts fertile window using hormone patterns.
